ticketCondition.title: Ready to Use Immediately
desc: Must be purchased before 20:55 on the day of use (local time), effective immediately after booking

ticketCondition.title: Ticket Redemption Not Required
desc: You'll need your 「Electronic admission voucher」to verify and use your booking
Child ticket should be selected and booked together with Adult ticket -the lighting will be on from 5:30 p.m. to 9:30 p.m.

ticketCondition.title: Non-refundable
desc: Once successfully booked, this product is non-refundable.
Date changes are not permitted after booking

ticketCondition.title: Conditions
desc: Age: 13 and over(Refers to travelers' ages on the date of travel. Age is calculated according to date of birth.)
